name: Db_get_mem_handle
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3.7 R1 and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Get memory handle for an SQLite database that was opened with db_open.

params_body.name: DB:db
params_body.description: The index of the database connection (returned by db_open).

return_values: Returns the memory handle for a specified database.
